project.description: System created for registries to periodically validate and alert domains about DNS or DNSSEC misconfiguration.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/sh
go get -u github.com/nsf/termbox-go
cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/rafaeljusto/shelter version=`cat shelter.go | grep "Shelter version" | grep -Eo "[0-9]\.([0-9]|\.)+"` ./deploy/debian/gendeb.sh
curl -f -T shelter_0.1_amd64.deb -urafaeljusto: https://api.bintray.com/content/rafaeljusto/deb/shelter/$version/shelter_${version}_amd64.deb curl -f -H "Content-Type:application/json" -X POST -d "{}" -urafaeljusto: https://api.bintray.com/content/rafaeljusto/deb/shelter/$version/publish
